name: 人類與自然資源
comment: 1.本課程為與日本關西大學合開之國際線上課程。2.上課時間需與日本同步，調整為上午10:00。3.學生請自備筆電或平板可穩定上網視訊之設備。
goals: Understand the importance of water resources and sustainable management
Be aware of water resources issues at local region
Be able to qualitatively and quantitatively describe the main processes in the hydrologic cycle
Be able to provide solutions for typical water resources problems found in practice.
